content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted **materials ** * japanese size 5/0 3 0 mm crochet hook * approx 160g 832 m light fingering weight 3-ply yarn color a * approx 90g 282 86 m sport weight yarn color b * approx 115g 361 43 m sport weight yarn color c **note ** for the saratto cotton 3-ply yarn *only* use 2 strands at once 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/28ss/7 pdf
